name: Kattonia
startIntroPart1: May the Great K help you to bring the Balance... But for now, you, One who follows K, will need to be in charge of this nation. Can you set this world to the balance once again, or will you fail this quest? The rest is up tou You...
startIntroPart2: So, what will you do to achieve the outcome you like? This is your choice, so lead us, commander! For the Balance!
declaringWar: One has decided that You are a threat to the Balance. Prepare for a fight, and let the Balance choose the True!
attacked: The Balance will not forget this!
defeated: It seems that the Balance has made the decision. I accept this defeat...
introduction: Oh, you are an interesting One. May the Balance guide us both!
neutralHello: So, what does One before me needs?
hateHello: One before me, make this quick!
hateNo: This request is unnacceptable! No, no, no!
The Balance will not tolerate such a request!
hateYes: The Balance says that this is acceptable...
afterPeace: The Balance thinks that this was the best outcome for us both.
uniques: [+1 Science] for every known Natural Wonder
May buy [All] buildings with [Science] [in all cities]
May buy [All] units with [Science] [in all cities]
